meanings.definition: The act of descending a rock face or other steep surface using a rope.
meanings.sent1: Abseiling down the cliff was thrilling.
meanings.sent2: We learned about abseiling in our outdoor adventure class.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried abseiling down the tree with a tiny rope.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was like a master abseiling down a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The sound of abseiling echoed through the canyon.

meanings.definition: To descend a rock face or other steep surface using a rope.
meanings.sent1: We will be abseiling from the top of the peak.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys abseiling during his mountain expeditions.
meanings.sent3: The cat attempted abseiling down the curtains but got stuck.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was abseiling her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The sun was abseiling behind the horizon, painting the sky.
